alert.note: Alert for Fairfield (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 12 at 7:01PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Fairfield County through 745 PM EDT... At 701 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Fairfield County Airport, or near Winnsboro, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Winnsboro, Fairfield County Airport, Ridgeway, Rion, Winnsboro Mills, Fairfield Elementary School, Lebanon Fire Station, Smallwood, and Fairfield County Detention Center. This includes Interstate 77 between mile markers 30 and 45. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
